materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph album. It has a brown case cover, with a dark brown spine. There is a decorative gold outline along the spine and the two corners of the front cover. The album cover looks worn out, with some scratches and faded edges, especially along the corners and the spine.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java
subject_terms_1: scenery (landscape) portraits colonization inhabited places buildings (structures)
subject_terms_2: Photograph albums Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Portraits Colonization
